nodes.text: Black Leader, also known as Black One, was a callsign used by the Galactic Empire and later the Resistance. The X-wing pilot Poe Dameron used the title while leading Black Squadron, but also used it while commanding other units, such as Red and Blue Squadrons. During Black Squadron's mission to gather the Resistance's allies and bring new systems into the Resistance, Temmin Wexley flew as Black Leader.
